title: Save $248 off this Microsoft Office bundle with training courses
content:
Macworld

If you use a computer, you need Office and need to know how to use it. This bundle of Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2019 for Windows and a Microsoft training course gives you both, at a special price now through the end of January 7th.

One half of this bundle is a full instant download of Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2019 for Windows. The bundle includes the 2019 versions of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Publisher, and Access. The lifetime license for one PC is a lifetime purchase with no subscriptions or other downloads.

Meanwhile, the Microsoft course bundle goes through Office program by program, showing you tips and tricks to get the most from it. The bundle is ideal for anybody new to Office, such as students, small business owners, or anyone launching an office career.

Get this Microsoft Office software and training bundle for $39.97, $248 off the $288 MSRP, now through the end of January 7th.

 

Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2019 for Windows & Microsoft Course Bundle – $39.97
